```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(rio)
link="https://github.com/annks10/stateData_pubPol542/raw/main/NST-EST2022-POP.xlsx"
mydata=import(link)
```
```{r}
head(mydata)
```
```{r}
mydata=import(link,skip=3) # position of column names
head(mydata)
```
```{r}
# start of data
mydata=mydata[-c(1:5),]
row.names(mydata)=NULL
```

```{r}
tail(mydata,6)
```
```{r}
mydata=mydata[-c(54:58),]
mydata
```

```{r}
names(mydata)
```
```{r}
names(mydata)[c(1,2)]=c("place","2020_base")
mydata
```
```{r}
mydata$place
```
```{r}
gsub(".","",mydata$place,fixed = T)
```
```{r}
mydata$place=gsub(".","",mydata$place,fixed = T)
```
```{r}
mydata=mydata[complete.cases(mydata),]
```
